[Chim add instead of subtract]
04100000 004ACC44 0B01010A

[Chim add instead of subtract off]
04100000 004ACC44 4B01010A

[Chim gain x256]
04100000 004ACC10 0B01210A

[Chim gain x256 off]
04100000 004ACC10 0B01010A

[GP gain x256]
04100000 004ADE40 0B022129

[GP gain x256 off]
04100000 004ADE40 0B020129
